attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Any members of parliment who are found guilty of claiming expenses fraudently should be made to stand up in a court of law and be charged for fraud, because its what your goverment would do to you if you stole from the goverment

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
